name: Solitaire Zen
description:
✭ "Classic game, revolutionary execution. The genre's first leap since Windows Solitaire." - FreeAppsArcade.com

Prepare yourself for the stunningly gorgeous, spectacularly immersive Solitaire Zen. It's classic Klondike (Windows) solitaire like you've never seen it before. Look around at the cards, the environment, the sky...liberate yourself from the shackles of forced perspective.

Gain experience, level up, and earn your rank in the worldwide leaderboards. Above all else, enjoy yourself. Let Solitaire Zen transport you to a world of pure bliss.

✔ Staggering graphics with high-res display support
✔ Virtual reality
✔ Hyper-realistic ambient audio
✔ Standard controls for non-gyro devices
✔ Global online leaderboards
✔ Leveling and ranking system

✭ This is our first leap onto Android, with many more of our smash-hit iOS apps to come. If you run into any trouble on your specific device, please let us know at http://naquatic.com/support and we'll push out a fix as soon as humanly possible. Game on!
